title: Communauté d'agglomération Maubeuge Val de Sambre
text:
The <a href="Communaut%C3%A9%20d%27agglom%C3%A9ration">Communauté d'agglomération</a> Maubeuge Val de Sambre is an <a href="Communes%20of%20France%23Intercommunality">intercommunal</a> structure, centred on the <a href="Communes%20of%20France">city</a> of <a href="Maubeuge">Maubeuge</a>. It is located in the <a href="Nord%20%28French%20department%29">Nord</a> <a href="departments%20of%20France">department</a>, in the <a href="Hauts-de-France">Hauts-de-France</a> <a href="regions%20of%20France">region</a>, northern <a href="France">France</a>. It was created in December 2013. Its seat is in Maubeuge. Its population was 125,651 in 2017, of which 29,944 in Maubeuge proper.
Composition.
The communauté d'agglomération consists of the following 43 communes:
